root.SelectSQL: select Id,TagId,CreationTime as InStorageDate from CMCSTBEPCCARD t order by TagId asc
root.CheckSQL: select Id from CMCSTBEPCCARD where TagId=:TagId
root.InsertSQL: insert into CMCSTBEPCCARD (ID,isdeleted,creatoruserid,lastmodifieruserid,CARDNUMBER, TAGID,creationtime,lastmodificationtime) values (:Id,0,1,1,:CARDNUMBER,:TAGID,to_date(:InStorageDate,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'),to_date(:InStorageDate,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'))
